name: NewHanoverRegionalMedicalCenter
0:
”Alexa, open NHRMC.”
”Alexa, ask NHRMC for Urgent Care.”
”Alexa, ask NHRMC for essential items.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. h. r. m. c.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
At New Hanover Regional Medical Center our missions is “Leading our Community to Outstanding Health”; we realize a visit to the hospital can cause a great deal of anxiety, we’ve created this skill to provide some helpful information to reduce the stress of a hospital visit. 

So what can you do? Here are some features of the NHRMC skill: 

*NEWEST*
Location services! Get directions to the nearest urgent care!
An introduction to NHRMC.
Suggested items to bring in the case of an emergency or a planned visit.
Information on parking around the hospital. 
A list of important phone numbers.
Information about our care team.
What you can expect when visiting NHRMC.
Information that pertains to visitors.
Where you can view your medical records and pay bills.
Information about lost items and who to call if you've lost an item.

We are always looking to improve features and are open to suggestions for future additions. If you have anything you would like to see, email us at alexa.skills@nhrmc.org

Visit our website at https://www.nhrmc.org
